trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3MAGIAARCA_00515_SYSTEM_000_000<tab>This strange and mysterious device does not appear to be operational...

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3MAGIAARCA_00515_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>This strange and mysterious device appears to be the logos manipulator of which Drake spoke. Hopefully it is as simple and easy to use as he claims...
